description:
After the time skip, Ayato adopts the identity of Black Rabbit and takes credit for his http://anidb.net/ch95700 [sister]`s crimes. He also becomes http://anidb.net/ch95691 [Hinami]`s partner after she joins the http://anidb.net/ch70052 [organization] and cares deeply for her, to the point of staging an invasion of http://anidb.net/ch95846 [Cochlea] in order to save her from being executed.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kirishima Ayato
